entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core Cosmos query on owned child collection (simple question) #30064
  • how to override like or contain operator in sqlite ? #30063
  • KeyNotFoundException on nullable nested object in JSON column if that object does not exist. #30062
  • Make it easier for library authors to integrate with an existing DbContext #30061
  • RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetDefaultTableName should return null for abstract types in a TPC hierarchy #30060
  • EFCore 7.0.2 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #30059
  • Non-empty second migration in TPC scheme using inheritance #30058
  • Migrations slow build after upgrading from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET 6 #30057
  • Keyless type with property that looks like collection navigation does not fail model validation #30056
  • Nested Entities coming as null on reading using EF core 6 with Azure Cosmos DB #30055
  • Can the default type mappings be customized for Scaffold-DbContext? #30054
  • EF7 duplicates entities and throws exception on triple nested relationship #30053
  • Combination of `GroupBy`, `FirstOrDefault` and `Select` throws a KeyNotFoundException #30052
  • Unable to load mod_spatialite extension into sqlite connection on .NET 7 #30051
  • After running the Cli the many to many tables are missing. #30050
  • EF Core slower than EF 6 #30048

PullRequests

Created

  • Use precision/scale facets instead of store type when reverse engineering #30049

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Take schema into account when comparing FK constraints. #30047
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3

Updated

  • Sequence cache support #29716
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
